title: Kane And The Elven Realms
description: Kane arrives with his father Lucio to celebrate Princess' Allison's birthday only to find themselves in the middle of an eternal war between The Fallen One and all those who oppose him. In the midst of all this chaos Kane finds himself torn between two women: Allison who he feels a responsibility to protect and the Fury warrior Meg who ignites every inch of his body to love her and crave her and only her. Discover a world where Fire, Water, Air, and Earth Elementals roam freely as they defend their world from anything and everything that threatens to destroy it.
author: Seraphine Abrams
